title: R10 for you, R25 for a friend
description: Friends can get up to R25 off—you’ll get R10 when they place their first order.
faq:
Referral Terms and Conditions
For an Juvo user (or “Referrer”) to receive the referral reward stated in the user's account and for each new customer (each a “referral” or “Referee”) to receive the promotional offer, each new customer (“Referree”) must use the Referrer-provided promo code by the expiration date indicated in the Referrer’s account;
